data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 27349
data.actual_result: The text of the person is black
data.expected_result: The text of the person talking should be white and not black
data.short_description: If you talk in a voice channel using Discord Canary, the talking user's text is black instead of the standard white
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord Canary - Go to a voice channel - Start talking - You'll notice that the name of the person talking is black (I've only tried with myself) - Someone else tried with other users and confirms it works with them also
